my-description: Software engineer, specialized in web development. Although I have had very little work experience in the field, I have been dedicating my free time to learn and practice different programming languages and web technologies, both front-end and back-end. I consider myself a proactive person, with teamwork skills and a great ability to adapt to change. I am excited to continue my training and development in the web development field and I am sure I can contribute with my skills and knowledge in any project I can participate in. My other hobbies are playing video games, watching soccer, spending time with my family, and seeing new places.
